main event: A cigar-shaped object was observed in Steelton, Pennsylvania on June 4, 1955.
interesting points: The object was white and had a level flight path., The sighting lasted for approximately 10 minutes., No sound was reported during the observation., The observer noted that the object faded out of sight., The investigation suggested it could possibly be an aircraft or balloon.
witness description: The observer was a duty controller, alert for flying objects.
